en-US.name: Radio Zet
en-US.description:
Plays Radio Zet from Poland on your Alexa device!
Simply say "Alexa open Radio Zet" and listen to your favourite Polish Radio station.
The radio station is in Polish and features varying genres of music.
Say "Alexa stop" to stop playing.
en-US.updatesDescription: First release of Radio Zet for Alexa!
